description:
NumberInput

React component that provides context and logic to all
number input sub-components.

It renders a `div` by default.

focusInputOnChange.description:
If `true`, the input will be focused as you increment
or decrement the value with the stepper
focusInputOnChange.name: focusInputOnChange

clampValueOnBlur.description:
This controls the value update when you blur out of the input.
- If `true` and the value is greater than `max`, the value will be reset to `max`
- Else, the value remains the same.
clampValueOnBlur.name: clampValueOnBlur

getAriaValueText.description:
This is used to format the value so that screen readers
can speak out a more human-friendly value.

It is used to set the `aria-valuetext` property of the input
getAriaValueText.name: getAriaValueText

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the input will be in readonly mode
isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the input will have `aria-invalid` set to `true`
isInvalid.name: isInvalid

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the input will be disabled
isDisabled.name: isDisabled

id.description: The `id` to use for the number input field.
id.name: id

pattern.description: The pattern used to check the <input> element's value against on form submission.
pattern.name: pattern

inputMode.description:
Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user. It also determines
the type of keyboard shown to the user on mobile devices
inputMode.name: inputMode

allowMouseWheel.description: If `true`, the input's value will change based on mouse wheel
allowMouseWheel.name: allowMouseWheel

name.description: The HTML `name` attribute used for forms
name.name: name

onChange.description: The callback fired when the value changes
onChange.name: onChange

precision.description: The number of decimal points used to round the value
precision.name: precision

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the counter. Should be less than `max` and greater than `min`
defaultValue.name: defaultValue

value.description: The value of the counter. Should be less than `max` and greater than `min`
value.name: value

step.description: The step used to increment or decrement the value
step.name: step

min.description: The minimum value of the counter
min.name: min

max.description: The maximum value of the counter
max.name: max

keepWithinRange.description:
This controls the value update behavior in general.

- If `true` and you use the stepper or up/down arrow keys,
 the value will not exceed the `max` or go lower than `min`

- If `false`, the value will be allowed to go out of range.
keepWithinRange.name: keepWithinRange

focusBorderColor.description:
The border color when the input is focused. Use color keys in `theme.colors`
@example focusBorderColor = "blue.500"
focusBorderColor.name: focusBorderColor

errorBorderColor.description:
The border color when the input is invalid. Use color keys in `theme.colors`
@example errorBorderColor = "red.500"
errorBorderColor.name: errorBorderColor

isFullWidth.name: isFullWidth
